markdownRemark.rawMarkdownBody:
# --description-- Add a `legend` element with the text `What's your cat's personality?` inside the second `fieldset` element. # --hints-- You have either deleted the second `fieldset` element or it is missing an opening tag or closing tag. ```js assert( document.querySelectorAll('fieldset').length === 2 && code.match(/<\/fieldset>/g).length === 2 ); ``` Your `legend` element should have an opening tag. Opening tags have this syntax: ``. ```js const secondFieldset = $('fieldset')[1]; assert( secondFieldset && [...secondFieldset.children].filter((child) => child.nodeName === 'LEGEND') .length ); ``` Your `legend` element should have a closing tag. Closing tags have a `/` just after the `<` character. ```js assert(code.match(/<\/legend\>/g).length === 2); ``` The `legend` element should have the text `What's your cat's personality?`. You have either omitted the text or have a typo. ```js const secondFieldset = $('fieldset')[1]; assert( secondFieldset && [...secondFieldset.children].filter((child) => { const extraSpacesRemoved = child.innerText.replace(/\s+/g, ' '); return ( child.nodeName === 'LEGEND' && extraSpacesRemoved.match(/What's your cat's personality\??$/i) ); }).length ); ``` # --seed-- ## --seed-contents-- ```html
